author: cnbc.com
title: Stock Review for Networking & Communication Devices Investors -- Cisco Systems, Extreme Networks, Finisar, and Juniper Networks
text:
NEW YORK, April 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on CSCO, EXTR, FNSR, and JNPR which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . WallStEquities.com has selected the following stocks for review today: Cisco Systems Inc. (NASDAQ: CSCO), Extreme Networks Inc. (NASDAQ: EXTR), Finisar Corp. (NASDAQ: FNSR), and Juniper Networks Inc. (NYSE: JNPR). Networking and Communication Devices companies design and manufacture networking equipment, as well as servers, for enterprise, commercial, and consumer use. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below. www.wallstequities.com/registration
Cisco Systems
On Thursday, shares in San Jose, California headquartered Cisco Systems Inc. recorded a trading volume of 22.28 million shares. The stock ended the day at $43.34, rising 2.14% from the last trading session. The Company's shares have advanced 8.59% in the previous three months and 31.65% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 1.04% and 18.19%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of Cisco Systems, which designs, manufactures, and sells Internet Protocol based networking and other products related to the communications and information technology industry worldwide, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 54.62.
On March 16 th , 2018, research firm Citigroup reiterated its 'Buy' rating on the Company's stock with an increase of the target price from $46 a share to $52 a share.
On March 30 th , 2018, Cisco Systems received the 2018 AT&T Supplier Award for its outstanding performance and service to AT&T affiliates during the past year. The Company is being recognized for its outstanding contributions across a broad scope of selection criteria, including supplier diversity results, creative cost management solutions, teamwork, customer service, product/service performance, and sustainability. Get the full research report on CSCO for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CSCO
Extreme Networks
San Jose, California headquartered Extreme Networks Inc.'s stock rose 3.07%, finishing yesterday's session at $11.07 with a total trading volume of 1.26 million shares. The Company's shares have gained 57.24% over the past year. The stock is trading below its 200-day moving average by 4.95%. Additionally, shares of Extreme Networks, which provides software-driven networking solutions for enterprise customers worldwide, have an RSI of 46.11.
On April 02 nd , 2018, Extreme Networks (EXTR) introduced Extreme Capital Solutions, dedicated to providing competitive and flexible financing to customers, partners, and prospects looking to acquire the Company's solutions. Extreme Capital Solutions is the combination of EXTR's CPEaaS (CPE As a Service) offerings with the Brocade Network Subscriptions business that recently became part of the Company. Get access to our top-rated research, including the free report on EXTR at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=EXTR
Finisar
Shares in Sunnyvale, California headquartered Finisar Corp. ended the session 1.19% higher at $16.19. The stock recorded a trading volume of 2.53 million shares. The Company's shares are trading 7.88% below their 50-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Finisar, which provides optical subsystems and components for data communication and telecommunication applications in the US, China, Malaysia, and internationally, have an RSI of 47.02.
On April 05 th , 2018, research firm Morgan Stanley upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Equal-Weight' to 'Overweight'. Click here to subscribe for a free membership which welcomes you with our report on FNSR at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=FNSR
Juniper Networks
At the closing bell on Thursday, Sunnyvale, California headquartered Juniper Networks Inc.'s stock rose 0.65%, finishing at $24.85. A total volume of 2.73 million shares was traded. The Company's shares are trading 2.61% below their 50-day moving average. Additionally, shares of Juniper Networks, which designs, develops, and sells network products and services worldwide, have an RSI of 49.74.
On March 16 th , 2018, Juniper Networks confirmed that it will release its preliminary financial results for Q1 ended March 31 st , 2018 on May 01 st , 2018, after the close of the market. Senior management will host a conference call at 2:00 pm PT that day. The call will be webcast live and archived under the Investor Relations section of the Company's website. To get free access to your research report on JNPR, sign up at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=JNPR
Wall St. Equities :
Wall St. Equities (WSE) produces regular sponsored and non-sponsored reports, articles, stock market blogs, and popular investment newsletters covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and micro-cap stocks. WSE has two distinct and independent departments. One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
